page_header.title: News & Updates
page_header.description: Stay informed with the latest from DCM Financing and the commercial lending industry

news_items.title: $45M Commercial Real Estate Acquisition in Miami
news_items.description: DCM Financing secured purchase financing through our direct relationships with lenders for this premier mixed-use property in Miami's Brickell financial district. Clean packaging and quick answers ensured the client closed with confidence.

news_items.title: Ground-Up Development Financing Trends 2025
news_items.description: Analysis of emerging trends in ground-up development financing, including how construction lenders and banks we work with directly are matching draws, contingencies, and interest reserves to build schedules for complex projects.

news_items.title: DCM Financing Expands Conversion Financing Division
news_items.description: We're excited to announce the expansion of our specialized conversion financing team to handle increasing demand for office-to-residential and adaptive reuse projects. We now speak directly with more lenders and banks that understand change-of-use risk.

news_items.title: $32M Luxury Hotel Acquisition Financing
news_items.description: Financing secured for the acquisition of a 200-room luxury hotel in Austin, Texas. Our daily work with hotel lenders and banks ensured we presented brand, management, and market performance the way credit teams expect.

news_items.title: $28M Nursing Home Facility Refinancing
news_items.description: Successful refinancing of a 150-bed skilled nursing facility in Phoenix, Arizona. Our direct lines to healthcare lenders and banks allowed us to package census, reimbursements, and operator track record to support reliable capital for facility upgrades.

news_items.title: $65M South America Hotel Portfolio Financing
news_items.description: DCM Financing arranged $65 million in financing for a portfolio of three boutique hotels across Brazil and Colombia. For this select project, we coordinated with banks and capital partners active in key South American markets, handling cross-border details to keep the deal moving.

news_items.title: $38M Office Building Acquisition in Chicago
news_items.description: DCM Financing provided acquisition financing for a Class A office building in Chicago's central business district. Our direct relationships with lenders funding stabilized assets ensured competitive terms and expedited approvals.

news_items.title: $52M Mixed-Use Development in Denver
news_items.description: Comprehensive financing secured for a new mixed-use development in Denver featuring retail, office, and residential components. We lined up construction lenders matching draws, contingencies, and interest reserves to the complex build schedule.
